title: Videoview
description: Video Streaming Website is a web application built using React.js that allows users to watch, like and share videos.

title: Datacenter in three.js
description: This project aims to develop an interactive 3D visualization of a datacenter using Three.js. The visualization will allow users to explore a virtual datacenter environment.

title: Haunted House in three.js
description: The project showcasing a haunted house in a spooky environment. The scene includes a brick house with a wooden door, surrounded by tombstones and eerie lighting effects to enhance the haunted atmosphere.
